casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tywaine Sherell DENNY. No. 572P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 6, 2006. Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, for Denny. James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 635 S.E.2d 438.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of November 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of November 2006."
